And in case you were wondering where the inspiration for the blog name came from. I have the #CodeNewbies Twitter chat to thank for that. In a moment of genius I tweeted the following: <blockquote class="twitter-tweet" lang="en"><p>A4: To prepare for our tech future, I need to ABL: always be learning! #CodeNewbie</p>â€” Britney Wright (@britneywright) June 26, 2014</blockquote> And a name and new blog idea were born.
